```{r}

```

Save protein objects for downstream notebooks
```{r}
protein_robust_flt_sn <- readRDS('../results/protein_sum_flt_sn.rds')
```


```{r}
dat <- exprs(protein_robust_flt_sn$`AGC: 2E5`)[,c(1:4, 8:10)] %>% log(base=2)

spike <- factor(rep(c(1, 6), c(4,3)))
study.design <- model.matrix(~ spike)

fit <- lmFit(dat, study.design)
fit <- eBayes(fit)
plotSA(fit)

```
